title: #213: Guns With BJ Campbell
description:
Thank you for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Gun Rights Blogger BJ Campbell to discuss gun right, gun control and what is really going on in America when it comes to Gun Death statistics. Thank you so much for all of your love and support.

Please check out BJ Campbell's blog on Guns.
https://medium.com/handwaving-freakoutery

Thank you to our sponsors:
Blue Chew; Right now, we’ve got a special deal for our listeners: Visit BlueChew.com and get your first shipment FREE when use our special promo code HAT -- Just pay $5 shipping. Again, that’s B - L - U - E - CHEW dot com, promo code HAT to try it FREE.

manscaped.com, and use code TINFOILHAT
